title: Scikit-Learn Iterative Imputer
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use Scikit-Learn's `IterativeImputer` class to impute missing values in a dataset. We will compare different estimators to see which one is best for the `IterativeImputer` when using a `BayesianRidge` estimator on the California housing dataset with a single value randomly removed from each row.
